Definition: 12-digit geographic identifier: State(2) + County(3) + Tract(6) + Block Group(1)
Optimizer_Use: Primary key for joining with spatial boundaries

Definition: Human-readable location description
Optimizer_Use: Human verification only

Definition: Total population count for the block group
Optimizer_Use: BASELINE: Current optimizer uses this for coverage calculation

Definition: Total number of households in the block group
Optimizer_Use: Context/denominator

Definition: Median annual household income in dollars
Optimizer_Use: Future: Inverse weighting (lower = more vulnerable)

Definition: Households with annual income less than $25,000
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for economic vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of households with income less than $25,000 (Low_Income_HH / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Households receiving Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for food insecurity

Definition: Proportion of households receiving SNAP benefits (HH_SNAP / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Households receiving public assistance income
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for public assistance need

Definition: Proportion of households receiving public assistance (HH_Public_Assistance / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Total population age 0 to 17 years
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for child vulnerability

Definition: Population age 0 to 4 years
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for young child vulnerability

Definition: Population age 5 to 17 years
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for school-age vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of population age 0 to 17 (Children_0_17 / POP)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Total population age 65 years and older
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for elderly vulnerability

Definition: Population age 65 to 74 years
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for younger elderly

Definition: Population age 75 years and older
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for older elderly

Definition: Proportion of population age 65 and older (Elderly_65_Plus / POP)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Proportion of dependent population (Children_0_17 + Elderly_65_Plus) / POP
Optimizer_Use: Future: Composite dependency vulnerability factor

Definition: Households with one or more children under 18
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for family burden

Definition: Proportion of households with children (HH_With_Children / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Single-parent households with children
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for single-parent vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of single-parent households (Single_Parent_HH / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Renter-occupied housing units
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for renter vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of occupied units that are renter-occupied (Renter_Occupied / Occupied_Housing_Units)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Vacant housing units
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for neighborhood instability

Definition: Proportion of total housing units that are vacant (Vacant_Housing_Units / Total_Housing_Units)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Housing units built before 1940
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for structural vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of housing units built before 1940 (Built_Before_1940 / Housing_Age_Universe)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Workers age 16 years and older
Optimizer_Use: Context/denominator

Definition: Workers who do not drive alone to work (proxy for no private vehicle access)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for transportation vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of workers without private vehicle access (Workers_No_Car / Total_Workers)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)

Definition: Households without an internet subscription
Optimizer_Use: Future: Weight population for communication vulnerability

Definition: Proportion of households without internet (HH_No_Internet / Total_Households)
Optimizer_Use: Future: Normalized vulnerability factor (0-1 scale)
